sql_list.table_used_desc: truncates the table curated.dim_customer_profile if it has data

sql_list.sql_query:
insert into stg.stg_customer 
(SELECT p."BusinessEntityID"
      ,"PersonType"
      ,"Title"
      ,"FirstName"
      ,"MiddleName"
      ,"LastName"
      ,"Suffix"
      ,"EmailPromotion"
      ,"Demographics"
      ,"rowguid"
      ,pc."ModifiedDate"
  FROM lnd.customer p left join 
  (SELECT "BusinessEntityID"
      ,"PhoneNumber"
      ,pp."PhoneNumberTypeID"
      ,pp."ModifiedDate"
	  , pn."Name" Phone_number_typ
  FROM lnd.customer_phone pp
  left join lnd.customer_phone_type pn on pp."PhoneNumberTypeID"  = pn."PhoneNumberTypeID") pc
  on p."BusinessEntityID" = pc."BusinessEntityID")
sql_list.table_used_desc: insert statement to bring data from all the tables based on the joins
truncating the customer dimension before the load

sql_list.sql_query:
INSERT INTO dwh.dim_customer (
    "BusinessEntityID",
    "PersonType",
    "Title",
    "FirstName",
    "MiddleName",
    "LastName",
    "Suffix",
    "EmailPromotion",
    "Demographics",
    rowguid,
    "ModifiedDate"
)
SELECT
    "BusinessEntityID",
    "PersonType",
    "Title",
    "FirstName",
    "MiddleName",
    "LastName",
    "Suffix",
    "EmailPromotion",
    "Demographics",
    rowguid,
    "ModifiedDate"
FROM stg.stg_customer
sql_list.table_used_desc: loading data into customer dimension from stage layer
